text: A Daring Daylight Burglary is a 1903 British silent crime movie directed by Frank MottershawA DARING DAYLIGHT BURGLARYRichard Abel. Encyclopedia of Early Cinema and stars Sheffield Fire Brigade and Sheffield locals. ==Actors== *Sheffield Fire Brigade *Sheffield locals ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1903 movies Category:1900s crime movies Category:British silent movies Category:British crime movies
title: A Daring Daylight Burglary
